name: I'm a love interest on Valentine's Day
name_original: I'm a love interest on Valentine's Day
description:
Geum has been in a relationship for about half a year. It's Valentine's Day and he wants to show them how much he cares by giving them a delicious handmade treat. 
Will he succeed?

This is the demo released for ValentinesVN Jam 2021.
Full game is still in development.

Finished Game will Feature:
- Short casual gameplay (between 5-10 minutes per route)
- Three love interests
- Nine endings
- Familiar characters
- Animated sprites
- Windows and Mac builds

This game is a mini-sequel to 
I'm a love interest in my childhood friend's reverse harem!!!
available here on itch as well as steam.

Other games in the series are:
The Halloween special, made for Spooktober 2019.
Spooky fun at Geum's house.

The spin-off game, made for YaoiJam2020.
Geum is a side character in a side character's game.

The spin-off of a spin-off, made for YuriJam2020.
Learn to cook a traditional Teo Chew dish with Elliot.

Credits:
Red Chan (project lead)
Gabmag (editor)
Jeff Penny (SFX composer)
Judy McCroary (additional artist)
